title: Sr. Engineering Program Manager (native Cloud Infrastructure) - Apple Services Engineering
summary: The Apple Services Engineering team powers the App Store, Apple TV, Apple Music, Apple Podcasts, and Apple Books. They focus on delivering entertainment in over 35 languages to more than 150 countries.
description: The Cloud Infrastructure team at Apple Services Engineering is looking for an engineering program manager to deliver innovative product solutions that shape the future of large-scale infrastructure at Apple.
key_qualifications: 8-10 years proven experience in software development project management for Site Reliability Engineering / DevOps / Infrastructure domains. Exceptional organizational, project management, and technical savvy. Experience leading Cloud native Infrastructure programs.
education_experience: A BS/MS in Computer Science, Engineering or similar technical field is preferred
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay for this role ranges from $129,600 to $236,300. Apple employees also have the opportunity to become shareholders, receive comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, discounts on products and services, education reimbursement, and more.
